attributes.action: Make all GCSE grades A*-U again!
attributes.additional_details: Why change something that has been around for years and is perfectly fine, to a system not many people see the point of!
attributes.background: The Education Department  has decided to change the new GCSE grading system to one resulting in the use of numbers (9-1). As a result of this, it is highly confusing since no-one really knows what the grade equivelants are.
